data.title: Cogeneration units and complete solutions
data.meta_description: The XRGI® from EC POWER is a highly efficient, compact and multi certified cogeneration plant for all buildings that need power and heat.
data.text:
Cogeneration units and complete solutions from EC POWER

The very best of efficiency: Learn about our XRGI® CHP, discover the complete solutions for future-proof energy supply, and get to know why it is worth doing more than only heating.

Produce electricity and heat decentrally and climate-friendly

Save operating costs and also get subsidies and development funds

Meet the requirements on efficiency for new buildings and redevelopment

Supply all kinds and sizes of buildings all year round with electricity and heating demands of 50,000 to 1,500,000 kWh per year

Assure yourself of flexible planning, perfect installation and easy maintenance

In compliance with all requirements:

With the XRGI®, the market leader in its class, you are always right.

> Overview of XRGI® CHP

Seminars for the XRGI®

If you are a CHP-newcomer or long-term professional: We have the appropriate information offering. The EC POWER Academy provides everything, from the basic course to learn about the advantages of the cogeneration of heat and power, to the expert's seminar including professional exchange.

Visit our offered seminars in German language or contact EC POWER for seminars in English language.

www.ecpower-academy.de

The long-term running Minis

Our smallest ones are the real endurance runners: The XRGI® 6 and the XRGI® 9 only need a pit stop for maintenance every 10,000 operating hours. This is possible because of the high-performance engine that Toyota have especially developed for EC POWER. The Mini cogeneration plants for residential and small industrial buildings achieve a total degree of utilisation of up to 106 % and also make the use of combined heat and power interesting for the entry-level range.

The proven classic

With a total degree of utilisation of up to 103 %, the XRGI® 15 is an efficient solution for supplying medium-sized properties.

Its cost-effectiveness and quality are already enjoyed by thousands of satisfied customers – as well as the experts! No wonder that the XRGI® 15 has been awarded several times.
